<Link id="l01138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1138"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// i16 post increment store like:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1139"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// st X+, r24</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1140"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// st X+, r25</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1141"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (VT == MVT::i16 &amp;&amp; !<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/avrtargetlowering/#a54be6a6617929573276a5cffb1b9e355">Subtarget</a>.hasLowByteFirst())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1142"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1143"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1144"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1146"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1147"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (VT != MVT::i8 &amp;&amp; VT != MVT::i16) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1148"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1150"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1151"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>-&gt;getOpcode() != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a269996b43a1f3e1d1f84a70fd4387535">ISD::ADD</a> &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>-&gt;getOpcode() != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a9fa617e5567c3c2638938f7b9ddc3f1c">ISD::SUB</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1155"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantsdnode">ConstantSDNode</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;ConstantSDNode&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>-&gt;getOperand(1))) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1156"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RHSC = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a>-&gt;getSExtValue();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1157"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>-&gt;getOpcode() == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a9fa617e5567c3c2638938f7b9ddc3f1c">ISD::SUB</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1158"><Highlight kind="normal">      RHSC = -RHSC;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1159"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ((VT == MVT::i16 &amp;&amp; RHSC != 2) || (VT == MVT::i8 &amp;&amp; RHSC != 1)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1184"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1185"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//             Formal Arguments Calling Convention Implementation</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1186"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1187"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1188"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#include &quot;AVRGenCallingConv.inc&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1189"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1190"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Registers for calling conventions, ordered in reverse as required by ABI.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1191"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Both arrays must be of the same length.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1192" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af5d6511adaec426938bb02c1293d811e"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aad72cfbb210808985a9dc19f4e5d8542">MCPhysReg</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af5d6511adaec426938bb02c1293d811e">RegList8AVR</a>&#91;&#93; = &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1193"><Highlight kind="normal">    AVR::R25, AVR::R24, AVR::R23, AVR::R22, AVR::R21, AVR::R20,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1194"><Highlight kind="normal">    AVR::R19, AVR::R18, AVR::R17, AVR::R16, AVR::R15, AVR::R14,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1195"><Highlight kind="normal">    AVR::R13, AVR::R12, AVR::R11, AVR::R10, AVR::R9,  AVR::R8&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1196" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a64f933f8ece040a6f23728fc4d8781fb"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aad72cfbb210808985a9dc19f4e5d8542">MCPhysReg</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a64f933f8ece040a6f23728fc4d8781fb">RegList8Tiny</a>&#91;&#93; = &#123;AVR::R25, AVR::R24, AVR::R23,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1197"><Highlight kind="normal">                                         AVR::R22, AVR::R21, AVR::R20&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1198" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9acaeb675b10aa0f0638629fb9a5c7f2"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aad72cfbb210808985a9dc19f4e5d8542">MCPhysReg</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9acaeb675b10aa0f0638629fb9a5c7f2">RegList16AVR</a>&#91;&#93; = &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1200"><Highlight kind="normal">    AVR::R21R20, AVR::R20R19, AVR::R19R18, AVR::R18R17, AVR::R17R16,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1201"><Highlight kind="normal">    AVR::R16R15, AVR::R15R14, AVR::R14R13, AVR::R13R12, AVR::R12R11,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1202"><Highlight kind="normal">    AVR::R11R10, AVR::R10R9,  AVR::R9R8&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1203" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5b45425dfb6f9d37f9f57facaabc1b7b"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aad72cfbb210808985a9dc19f4e5d8542">MCPhysReg</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5b45425dfb6f9d37f9f57facaabc1b7b">RegList16Tiny</a>&#91;&#93; = &#123;AVR::R26R25, AVR::R25R24,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1204"><Highlight kind="normal">                                          AVR::R24R23, AVR::R23R22,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1205"><Highlight kind="normal">                                          AVR::R22R21, AVR::R21R20&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1206"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1207"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;assert</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(std::size(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af5d6511adaec426938bb02c1293d811e">RegList8AVR</a>) == std::size(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9acaeb675b10aa0f0638629fb9a5c7f2">RegList16AVR</a>),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1208"><Highlight kind="normal">              </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;8-bit and 16-bit register arrays must be of equal length&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1209"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;assert</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(std::size(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a64f933f8ece040a6f23728fc4d8781fb">RegList8Tiny</a>) == std::size(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5b45425dfb6f9d37f9f57facaabc1b7b">RegList16Tiny</a>),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1210"><Highlight kind="normal">              </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;8-bit and 16-bit register arrays must be of equal length&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1211"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1212"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Analyze incoming and outgoing function arguments. We need custom C++ code</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1213"><Highlight kind="comment">/// to handle special constraints in the ABI.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1214"><Highlight kind="comment">/// In addition, all pieces of a certain argument have to be passed either</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1215"><Highlight kind="comment">/// using registers or the stack but never mixing both.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1216"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ArgT&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1217" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8423e53bcc9782e23a4e48e8ef88d150"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8423e53bcc9782e23a4e48e8ef88d150">analyzeArguments</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/targetlowering/callloweringinfo">TargetLowering::CallLoweringInfo</a> &#42;CLI,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1218"><Highlight kind="normal">                             </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout">DataLayout</a> &#42;TD,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1219"><Highlight kind="normal">                             </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;ArgT&gt;</a> &amp;Args,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1220"><Highlight kind="normal">                             <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;CCValAssign&gt;</a> &amp;ArgLocs,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1221"><Highlight kind="normal">                             <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccstate">CCState</a> &amp;CCInfo, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Tiny) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1222"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Choose the proper register list for argument passing according to the ABI.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1223"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;MCPhysReg&gt;</a> RegList8;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1224"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;MCPhysReg&gt;</a> RegList16;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1225"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Tiny) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1226"><Highlight kind="normal">    RegList8 = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab9c6b351507d3c0730f4290919d43a12">ArrayRef</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a64f933f8ece040a6f23728fc4d8781fb">RegList8Tiny</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1227"><Highlight kind="normal">    RegList16 = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab9c6b351507d3c0730f4290919d43a12">ArrayRef</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5b45425dfb6f9d37f9f57facaabc1b7b">RegList16Tiny</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1228"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1229"><Highlight kind="normal">    RegList8 = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab9c6b351507d3c0730f4290919d43a12">ArrayRef</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af5d6511adaec426938bb02c1293d811e">RegList8AVR</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1230"><Highlight kind="normal">    RegList16 = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab9c6b351507d3c0730f4290919d43a12">ArrayRef</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9acaeb675b10aa0f0638629fb9a5c7f2">RegList16AVR</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1231"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1232"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1233"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumArgs = Args.size();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1234"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This is the index of the last used register, in RegList&#42;.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1235"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// -1 means R26 (R26 is never actually used in CC).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1236"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RegLastIdx = -1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1237"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Once a value is passed to the stack it will always be used</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1238"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> UseStack = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1239"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0; i != NumArgs;) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1240"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt">MVT</a> VT = Args&#91;i&#93;.VT;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1241"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We have to count the number of bytes for each function argument, that is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1242"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// those Args with the same OrigArgIndex. This is important in case the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1243"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// function takes an aggregate type.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1244"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Current argument will be between &#91;i..j).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1245"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ArgIndex = Args&#91;i&#93;.OrigArgIndex;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1246"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TotalBytes = VT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt/#ab8e1af73424a59a00656c9ffd505c03f">getStoreSize</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1247"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> j = i + 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1248"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (; j != NumArgs; ++j) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1249"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Args&#91;j&#93;.OrigArgIndex != ArgIndex)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1250"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1251"><Highlight kind="normal">      TotalBytes += Args&#91;j&#93;.VT.getStoreSize();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1252"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1253"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Round up to even number of bytes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1254"><Highlight kind="normal">    TotalBytes = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(TotalBytes, 2);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1255"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Skip zero sized arguments</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1256"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (TotalBytes == 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1257"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1258"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The index of the first register to be used</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1259"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RegIdx = RegLastIdx + TotalBytes;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1260"><Highlight kind="normal">    RegLastIdx = RegIdx;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1261"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If there are not enough registers, use the stack</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1262"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (RegIdx &gt;= RegList8.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1263"><Highlight kind="normal">      UseStack = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1264"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1265"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (; i != j; ++i) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1266"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt">MVT</a> VT = Args&#91;i&#93;.VT;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1267"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1268"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (UseStack) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1269"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> evt = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt">EVT</a>(VT).<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#ab0cfceeb37508e56f9c127e59766a668">getTypeForEVT</a>(CCInfo.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccstate/#a7df2f5c1123cf7727eaa5b91c0598adf">getContext</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1270"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = CCInfo.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccstate/#a808eee3ccda95974f0ac2b1c318ec336">AllocateStack</a>(TD-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout/#aa48b3b7e554b44f4e513d5dd8d9f9343">getTypeAllocSize</a>(evt),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1271"><Highlight kind="normal">                                               TD-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout/#a800e74bec9b78d6739665027c3616a55">getABITypeAlign</a>(evt));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1272"><Highlight kind="normal">        CCInfo.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccstate/#af04b635419bda8cbc4fe1f056b160f8d">addLoc</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1273"><Highlight kind="normal">            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccvalassign/#a36d9dd26dea75ebba5b55516b52e0752">CCValAssign::getMem</a>(i, VT, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>, VT, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccvalassign/#a2b78fd53da0b5df7bc4eacf7df556a45a8b73d77b9e54663c2e80a48d0917dce1">CCValAssign::Full</a>));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1274"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1275"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1276"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (VT == MVT::i8) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1277"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a> = CCInfo.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccstate/#a676595eca705be482ea3e77b9e3ea2ec">AllocateReg</a>(RegList8&#91;RegIdx&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1278"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (VT == MVT::i16) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1279"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a> = CCInfo.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccstate/#a676595eca705be482ea3e77b9e3ea2ec">AllocateReg</a>(RegList16&#91;RegIdx&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1280"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1281"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h/#ace243f5c25697a1107cce46626b3dc94">llvm&#95;unreachable</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1282"><Highlight kind="normal">              </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;calling convention can only manage i8 and i16 types&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1283"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1284"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a> &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;register not available in calling convention&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1285"><Highlight kind="normal">        CCInfo.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccstate/#af04b635419bda8cbc4fe1f056b160f8d">addLoc</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccvalassign/#a29708e79e029f1029d46d65e7631b778">CCValAssign::getReg</a>(i, VT, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>, VT, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccvalassign/#a2b78fd53da0b5df7bc4eacf7df556a45a8b73d77b9e54663c2e80a48d0917dce1">CCValAssign::Full</a>));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1286"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Registers inside a particular argument are sorted in increasing order</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1287"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (remember the array is reversed).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1288"><Highlight kind="normal">        RegIdx -= VT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt/#ab8e1af73424a59a00656c9ffd505c03f">getStoreSize</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1289"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1290"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1291"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1292"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1293"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1294"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Count the total number of bytes needed to pass or return these arguments.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1295"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ArgT&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1296"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1297" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aaf3a34e481e99124e251288ae497d041"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aaf3a34e481e99124e251288ae497d041">getTotalArgumentsSizeInBytes</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;ArgT&gt;</a> &amp;Args) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1298"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TotalBytes = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1299"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1300"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ArgT &amp;Arg : Args) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1301"><Highlight kind="normal">    TotalBytes += Arg.VT.getStoreSize();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1302"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1303"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TotalBytes;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1304"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1305"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1306"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Analyze incoming and outgoing value of returning from a function.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1307"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The algorithm is similar to analyzeArguments, but there can only be</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1308"><Highlight kind="comment">/// one value, possibly an aggregate, and it is limited to 8 bytes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1309"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ArgT&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1310" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a08acbbba5edd5a9d4090220358bc9305"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a08acbbba5edd5a9d4090220358bc9305">analyzeReturnValues</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;ArgT&gt;</a> &amp;Args,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1311"><Highlight kind="normal">                                <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccstate">CCState</a> &amp;CCInfo, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Tiny) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1312"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumArgs = Args.size();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1313"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TotalBytes = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aaf3a34e481e99124e251288ae497d041">getTotalArgumentsSizeInBytes</a>(Args);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1314"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// CanLowerReturn() guarantees this assertion.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1315"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Tiny)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1316"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(TotalBytes &lt;= 4 &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1317"><Highlight kind="normal">           </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;return values greater than 4 bytes cannot be lowered on AVRTiny&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1318"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1319"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(TotalBytes &lt;= 8 &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1320"><Highlight kind="normal">           </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;return values greater than 8 bytes cannot be lowered on AVR&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1321"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1322"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Choose the proper register list for argument passing according to the ABI.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1323"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;MCPhysReg&gt;</a> RegList8;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1324"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;MCPhysReg&gt;</a> RegList16;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1325"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Tiny) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1326"><Highlight kind="normal">    RegList8 = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab9c6b351507d3c0730f4290919d43a12">ArrayRef</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a64f933f8ece040a6f23728fc4d8781fb">RegList8Tiny</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1327"><Highlight kind="normal">    RegList16 = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab9c6b351507d3c0730f4290919d43a12">ArrayRef</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5b45425dfb6f9d37f9f57facaabc1b7b">RegList16Tiny</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1328"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1329"><Highlight kind="normal">    RegList8 = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab9c6b351507d3c0730f4290919d43a12">ArrayRef</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af5d6511adaec426938bb02c1293d811e">RegList8AVR</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1330"><Highlight kind="normal">    RegList16 = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab9c6b351507d3c0730f4290919d43a12">ArrayRef</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9acaeb675b10aa0f0638629fb9a5c7f2">RegList16AVR</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1331"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1332"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1333"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// GCC-ABI says that the size is rounded up to the next even number,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1334"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// but actually once it is more than 4 it will always round up to 8</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1335"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (TotalBytes &gt; 4) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1336"><Highlight kind="normal">    TotalBytes = 8;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1337"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1338"><Highlight kind="normal">    TotalBytes = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(TotalBytes, 2);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1339"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1340"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1341"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The index of the first register to use.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1342"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RegIdx = TotalBytes - 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1343"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0; i != NumArgs; ++i) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1344"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt">MVT</a> VT = Args&#91;i&#93;.VT;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1345"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1346"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (VT == MVT::i8) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1347"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a> = CCInfo.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccstate/#a676595eca705be482ea3e77b9e3ea2ec">AllocateReg</a>(RegList8&#91;RegIdx&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1348"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (VT == MVT::i16) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1349"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a> = CCInfo.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccstate/#a676595eca705be482ea3e77b9e3ea2ec">AllocateReg</a>(RegList16&#91;RegIdx&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1350"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1351"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h/#ace243f5c25697a1107cce46626b3dc94">llvm&#95;unreachable</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;calling convention can only manage i8 and i16 types&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1476"><Highlight kind="normal">  isTailCall = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1485"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// node so that legalize doesn&#39;t hack it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1486"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#adfebd8c4ae29ccd84c600c1e65d6b807a86408593c34af77fdd90df932f8b5261">Function</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1487"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> GlobalAddressSDNode &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ad96b7cf3182ce2ba85e5a7a93b12c441">G</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;GlobalAddressSDNode&gt;</a>(Callee)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1488"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> GlobalValue &#42;GV = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ad96b7cf3182ce2ba85e5a7a93b12c441">G</a>-&gt;getGlobal();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1490"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;Function&gt;</a>(GV);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1491"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a33e853ec74d48b1340d1d4bae772d30bac8ff9e15a93f800c74c05e7b37364816">Callee</a> =</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1493"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ExternalSymbolSDNode &#42;ES =</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1500"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (isVarArg) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1504"><Highlight kind="normal">                     <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/avrtargetlowering/#a54be6a6617929573276a5cffb1b9e355">Subtarget</a>.hasTinyEncoding());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1505"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1507"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Get a count of how many bytes are to be pushed on the stack.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1513"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1514"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// First, walk the register assignments, inserting copies.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1515"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AI, AE;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1516"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> HasStackArgs = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1517"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (AI = 0, AE = ArgLocs.size(); AI != AE; ++AI) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1518"><Highlight kind="normal">    CCValAssign &amp;VA = ArgLocs&#91;AI&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1519"><Highlight kind="normal">    EVT RegVT = VA.getLocVT();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1520"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64isellowering-cpp/#a51cb24bd3e700fcf2f93d1afbb555a16">SDValue</a> Arg = OutVals&#91;AI&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1521"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1522"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Promote the value if needed. With Clang this should not happen.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1523"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">switch</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (VA.getLocInfo()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1524"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">default</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1525"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h/#ace243f5c25697a1107cce46626b3dc94">llvm&#95;unreachable</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Unknown loc info!&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1526"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccvalassign/#a2b78fd53da0b5df7bc4eacf7df556a45a8b73d77b9e54663c2e80a48d0917dce1">CCValAssign::Full</a>:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1527"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1528"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccvalassign/#a2b78fd53da0b5df7bc4eacf7df556a45a7fd25972cdb14499949c7726499e0cb6">CCValAssign::SExt</a>:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1529"><Highlight kind="normal">      Arg = DAG.getNode(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a5183f3d72924bc7c77ba8d3f5de9f602">ISD::SIGN&#95;EXTEND</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, RegVT, Arg);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1530"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1539"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1540"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1541"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1542"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Stop when we encounter a stack argument, we need to process them</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1543"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// in reverse order in the loop below.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1544"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (VA.isMemLoc()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1545"><Highlight kind="normal">      HasStackArgs = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1546"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1547"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1548"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1549"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Arguments that can be passed on registers must be kept in the RegsToPass</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1550"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// vector.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1551"><Highlight kind="normal">    RegsToPass.push&#95;back(std::make&#95;pair(VA.getLocReg(), Arg));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1552"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1553"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1554"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Second, stack arguments have to walked.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1555"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Previously this code created chained stores but those chained stores appear</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1556"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to be unchained in the legalization phase. Therefore, do not attempt to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1557"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// chain them here. In fact, chaining them here somehow causes the first and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1558"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// second store to be reversed which is the exact opposite of the intended</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1559"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// effect.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1560"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (HasStackArgs) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1561"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8fc529c79977cdd01e187986f960a07f">SmallVector&lt;SDValue, 8&gt;</a> MemOpChains;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1562"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (; AI != AE; AI++) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1563"><Highlight kind="normal">      CCValAssign &amp;VA = ArgLocs&#91;AI&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1564"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64isellowering-cpp/#a51cb24bd3e700fcf2f93d1afbb555a16">SDValue</a> Arg = OutVals&#91;AI&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1565"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1566"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(VA.isMemLoc());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1567"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1568"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SP points to one stack slot further so add one to adjust it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1569"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64isellowering-cpp/#a51cb24bd3e700fcf2f93d1afbb555a16">SDValue</a> PtrOff = DAG.getNode(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1570"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a269996b43a1f3e1d1f84a70fd4387535">ISD::ADD</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetloweringbase/#a8aabf5d0aa80038973255ff2d1e1a9fc">getPointerTy</a>(DAG.getDataLayout()),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1571"><Highlight kind="normal">          DAG.getRegister(AVR::SP, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetloweringbase/#a8aabf5d0aa80038973255ff2d1e1a9fc">getPointerTy</a>(DAG.getDataLayout())),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1572"><Highlight kind="normal">          DAG.getIntPtrConstant(VA.getLocMemOffset() + 1, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1573"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1574"><Highlight kind="normal">      MemOpChains.push&#95;back(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1575"><Highlight kind="normal">          DAG.getStore(Chain, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, Arg, PtrOff,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1576"><Highlight kind="normal">                       <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinepointerinfo/#a2f877286c09d06ac6b9c5534736433d9">MachinePointerInfo::getStack</a>(MF, VA.getLocMemOffset())));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1577"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1578"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1579"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!MemOpChains.empty())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1580"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-loadstorevectorizer-cpp-/#afd1adfcbfce320e6265935ce4d6299a3">Chain</a> = DAG.getNode(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110ad469508535ce2082a1ab1f0e429187b8">ISD::TokenFactor</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, MVT::Other, MemOpChains);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1581"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1582"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1583"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Build a sequence of copy-to-reg nodes chained together with token chain and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1584"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// flag operands which copy the outgoing args into registers.  The InGlue in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1585"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// necessary since all emited instructions must be stuck together.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1883"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RemBB;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1884"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1885"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1886"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Do a multibyte AVR shift. Insert shift instructions and put the output</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1887"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// registers in the Regs array.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1888"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Because AVR does not have a normal shift instruction (only a single bit shift</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1889"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instruction), we have to emulate this behavior with other instructions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1890"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// It first tries large steps (moving registers around) and then smaller steps</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1891"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// like single bit shifts.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1892"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Large shifts actually reduce the number of shifted registers, so the below</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1893"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// algorithms have to work independently of the number of registers that are</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1894"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// shifted.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1895"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For more information and background, see this blogpost:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1896"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// https://aykevl.nl/2021/02/avr-bitshift</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1897" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad64501a368789645f6f80afbce82da90"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad64501a368789645f6f80afbce82da90">insertMultibyteShift</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;BB,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1898"><Highlight kind="normal">                                 <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mutablearrayref">MutableArrayRef</a>&lt;std::pair&lt;Register, int&gt;&gt; Regs,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1899"><Highlight kind="normal">                                 <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110">ISD::NodeType</a> Opc, int64&#95;t ShiftAmt) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01908" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1908"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Zero a register, for use in later operations.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1909"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> ZeroReg = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>.createVirtualRegister(&amp;AVR::GPR8RegClass);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1910"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a17e04afcf0c5efeb0eb6a9a45287b5e4">BuildMI</a>(&#42;BB, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, dl, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>.get(AVR::COPY), ZeroReg)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1911"><Highlight kind="normal">      .<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#a927857fc69e4b4f0cde307f86f180df5">addReg</a>(STI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/avrsubtarget/#a584960b0fd536f365fae55e2fa4f81a2">getZeroRegister</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1912"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1913"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Do a shift modulo 6 or 7 This is a bit more complicated than most shifts</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1914"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and is hard to compose with the rest, so these are special cased.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1915"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The basic idea is to shift one or two bits in the opposite direction and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1916"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// then move registers around to get the correct end result.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1917"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ShiftLeft &amp;&amp; (ShiftAmt % 8) &gt;= 6) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01918" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1918"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Left shift modulo 6 or 7</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01919" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1919"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1920"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Create a slice of the registers we&#39;re going to modify, to ease working</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1921"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// with them.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1922"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ShiftRegsOffset = ShiftAmt / 8;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1923"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ShiftRegsSize = Regs.size() - ShiftRegsOffset;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1924"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mutablearrayref">MutableArrayRef&lt;std::pair&lt;Register, int&gt;</a>&gt; ShiftRegs =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1925"><Highlight kind="normal">        Regs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mutablearrayref/#ae671f7b11f895cb673f6ee9a3c694359">slice</a>(ShiftRegsOffset, ShiftRegsSize);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1926"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1927"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Shift one to the right, keeping the least significant bit as the carry</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01928" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1928"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// bit.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01929" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1929"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad64501a368789645f6f80afbce82da90">insertMultibyteShift</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, BB, ShiftRegs, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a3c6553c8acebe1b57c211ee45e2d8f98">ISD::SRL</a>, 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1930"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01931" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1931"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Rotate the least significant bit from the carry bit into a new register</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01932" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1932"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (that starts out zero).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01933" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1933"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> LowByte = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>.createVirtualRegister(&amp;AVR::GPR8RegClass);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01934" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1934"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a17e04afcf0c5efeb0eb6a9a45287b5e4">BuildMI</a>(&#42;BB, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, dl, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>.get(AVR::RORRd), LowByte).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#a927857fc69e4b4f0cde307f86f180df5">addReg</a>(ZeroReg);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1935"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01936" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1936"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Shift one more to the right if this is a modulo-6 shift.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01937" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1937"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ShiftAmt % 8 == 6) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01938" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1938"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad64501a368789645f6f80afbce82da90">insertMultibyteShift</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, BB, ShiftRegs, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a3c6553c8acebe1b57c211ee45e2d8f98">ISD::SRL</a>, 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1939"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> NewLowByte = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>.createVirtualRegister(&amp;AVR::GPR8RegClass);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1940"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a17e04afcf0c5efeb0eb6a9a45287b5e4">BuildMI</a>(&#42;BB, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, dl, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>.get(AVR::RORRd), NewLowByte).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#a927857fc69e4b4f0cde307f86f180df5">addReg</a>(LowByte);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01942" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1942"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01943" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1943"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01944" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1944"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Move all registers to the left, zeroing the bottom registers as needed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01945" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1945"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; Regs.size(); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>++) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01946" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1946"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ShiftRegsIdx = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> + 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01947" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1947"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ShiftRegsIdx &lt; (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)ShiftRegs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01948" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1948"><Highlight kind="normal">        Regs&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; = ShiftRegs&#91;ShiftRegsIdx&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01949" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1949"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ShiftRegsIdx == (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)ShiftRegs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01950" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1950"><Highlight kind="normal">        Regs&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; = std::pair(LowByte, 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01951" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1951"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01952" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1952"><Highlight kind="normal">        Regs&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; = std::pair(ZeroReg, 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01953" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1953"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01954" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1954"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01955" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1955"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01956" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1956"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01957" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1957"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01958" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1958"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01959" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1959"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Right shift modulo 6 or 7</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01960" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1960"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!ShiftLeft &amp;&amp; (ShiftAmt % 8) &gt;= 6) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01961" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1961"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Create a view on the registers we&#39;re going to modify, to ease working</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01962" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1962"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// with them.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01963" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1963"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ShiftRegsSize = Regs.size() - (ShiftAmt / 8);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01964" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1964"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mutablearrayref">MutableArrayRef&lt;std::pair&lt;Register, int&gt;</a>&gt; ShiftRegs =</Highlight></CodeLine>
