<Link id="l01966" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1966"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01967" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1967"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Shift one to the left.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01968" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1968"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad64501a368789645f6f80afbce82da90">insertMultibyteShift</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, BB, ShiftRegs, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a8cc94e03dea594863073a02f5bb94997">ISD::SHL</a>, 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01969" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1969"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01970" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1970"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Sign or zero extend the most significant register into a new register.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01971" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1971"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The HighByte is the byte that still has one (or two) bits from the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01972" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1972"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// original value. The ExtByte is purely a zero/sign extend byte (all bits</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01973" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1973"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// are either 0 or 1).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01975" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1975"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> ExtByte = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01977" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1977"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Sign-extend bit that was shifted out last.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01983" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1983"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// byte, so HighByte and ExtByte are the same.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2004"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Move all to the right, while sign or zero extending.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2005"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = Regs.size() - 1; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &gt;= 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>--) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2006"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ShiftRegsIdx = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> - (Regs.size() - ShiftRegs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>()) - 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2009"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ShiftRegsIdx == -1) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2017"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2018"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2019"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For shift amounts of at least one register, simply rename the registers and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2020"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// zero the bottom registers.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2021"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ShiftLeft &amp;&amp; ShiftAmt &gt;= 8) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2022"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Move all registers one to the left.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2023"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; Regs.size() - 1; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>++) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2024"><Highlight kind="normal">      Regs&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; = Regs&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> + 1&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2025"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2026"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2027"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Zero the least significant register.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2028"><Highlight kind="normal">    Regs&#91;Regs.size() - 1&#93; = std::pair(ZeroReg, 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2029"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2030"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Continue shifts with the leftover registers.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2031"><Highlight kind="normal">    Regs = Regs.drop&#95;back(1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2032"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2033"><Highlight kind="normal">    ShiftAmt -= 8;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2034"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2035"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2036"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// And again, the same for right shifts.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2037"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> ShrExtendReg = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2038"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!ShiftLeft &amp;&amp; ShiftAmt &gt;= 8) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2039"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ArithmeticShift) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2040"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Sign extend the most significant register into ShrExtendReg.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2041"><Highlight kind="normal">      ShrExtendReg = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>.createVirtualRegister(&amp;AVR::GPR8RegClass);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2042"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> Tmp = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>.createVirtualRegister(&amp;AVR::GPR8RegClass);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2043"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a17e04afcf0c5efeb0eb6a9a45287b5e4">BuildMI</a>(&#42;BB, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, dl, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>.get(AVR::ADDRdRr), Tmp)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2044"><Highlight kind="normal">          .<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#a927857fc69e4b4f0cde307f86f180df5">addReg</a>(Regs&#91;0&#93;.first, 0, Regs&#91;0&#93;.second)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2045"><Highlight kind="normal">          .<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#a927857fc69e4b4f0cde307f86f180df5">addReg</a>(Regs&#91;0&#93;.first, 0, Regs&#91;0&#93;.second);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2046"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a17e04afcf0c5efeb0eb6a9a45287b5e4">BuildMI</a>(&#42;BB, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, dl, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>.get(AVR::SBCRdRr), ShrExtendReg)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2047"><Highlight kind="normal">          .<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#a927857fc69e4b4f0cde307f86f180df5">addReg</a>(Tmp)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2048"><Highlight kind="normal">          .<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#a927857fc69e4b4f0cde307f86f180df5">addReg</a>(Tmp);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2049"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2050"><Highlight kind="normal">      ShrExtendReg = ZeroReg;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2051"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2052"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (; ShiftAmt &gt;= 8; ShiftAmt -= 8) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2053"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Move all registers one to the right.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2054"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = Regs.size() - 1; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>--) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2055"><Highlight kind="normal">        Regs&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; = Regs&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> - 1&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2056"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2057"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2058"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Zero or sign extend the most significant register.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2059"><Highlight kind="normal">      Regs&#91;0&#93; = std::pair(ShrExtendReg, 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2060"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2061"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Continue shifts with the leftover registers.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2062"><Highlight kind="normal">      Regs = Regs.drop&#95;front(1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2063"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2064"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2065"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2066"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The bigger shifts are already handled above.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2067"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((ShiftAmt &lt; 8) &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Unexpect shift amount&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2068"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2069"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Shift by four bits, using a complicated swap/eor/andi/eor sequence.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2070"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// It only works for logical shifts because the bits shifted in are all</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2071"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// zeroes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2072"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// To shift a single byte right, it produces code like this:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2073"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   swap r0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2074"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   andi r0, 15</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2075"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For a two-byte (16-bit) shift, it adds the following instructions to shift</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2076"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the upper byte into the lower byte:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2077"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   swap r1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2078"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   eor r0, r1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2079"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   andi r1, 15</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2080"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   eor r0, r1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2081"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For bigger shifts, it repeats the above sequence. For example, for a 3-byte</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2082"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (24-bit) shift it adds:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2083"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   swap r2</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2084"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   eor r1, r2</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2085"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   andi r2, 15</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2086"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   eor r1, r2</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2087"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!ArithmeticShift &amp;&amp; ShiftAmt &gt;= 4) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2088"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> Prev = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2089"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; Regs.size(); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>++) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2090"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Idx = ShiftLeft ? <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> : Regs.size() - <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> - 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2091"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> SwapReg = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>.createVirtualRegister(&amp;AVR::LD8RegClass);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2094"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2095"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> R = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>.createVirtualRegister(&amp;AVR::GPR8RegClass);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2099"><Highlight kind="normal">        Prev = R;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2100"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2102"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a17e04afcf0c5efeb0eb6a9a45287b5e4">BuildMI</a>(&#42;BB, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, dl, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>.get(AVR::ANDIRdK), AndReg)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2104"><Highlight kind="normal">          .<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#a6c1f959947905135c7dd215b64957654">addImm</a>(ShiftLeft ? 240 : 0x0f);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2105"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2106"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> R = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>.createVirtualRegister(&amp;AVR::GPR8RegClass);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2107"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a17e04afcf0c5efeb0eb6a9a45287b5e4">BuildMI</a>(&#42;BB, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, dl, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>.get(AVR::EORRdRr), R)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2108"><Highlight kind="normal">            .<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#a927857fc69e4b4f0cde307f86f180df5">addReg</a>(Prev)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2109"><Highlight kind="normal">            .<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#a927857fc69e4b4f0cde307f86f180df5">addReg</a>(AndReg);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2110"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PrevIdx = ShiftLeft ? Idx - 1 : Idx + 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2111"><Highlight kind="normal">        Regs&#91;PrevIdx&#93; = std::pair(R, 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2112"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2113"><Highlight kind="normal">      Prev = AndReg;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2114"><Highlight kind="normal">      Regs&#91;Idx&#93; = std::pair(AndReg, 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2115"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2116"><Highlight kind="normal">    ShiftAmt -= 4;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2117"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2118"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2119"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Shift by one. This is the fallback that always works, and the shift</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2120"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// operation that is used for 1, 2, and 3 bit shifts.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2121"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ShiftLeft &amp;&amp; ShiftAmt) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2122"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Shift one to the left.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2123"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ssize&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = Regs.size() - 1; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &gt;= 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>--) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2127"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> == (ssize&#95;t)Regs.size() - 1) &#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// first iteration</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2142"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; Regs.size(); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>++) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2147"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Opc = ArithmeticShift ? AVR::ASRRd : AVR::LSRRd;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2162"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Do a wide (32-bit) shift.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2165"><Highlight kind="normal">                                   MachineBasicBlock &#42;BB)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2166"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TargetInstrInfo &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a> = &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/avrtargetlowering/#a54be6a6617929573276a5cffb1b9e355">Subtarget</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/avrsubtarget/#a68197f257d323a42ac0143c2770e086d">getInstrInfo</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2167"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dwarf-linker/#a463a58e257d5f6fb2c39eb9a2474fc24ac2e06fc138163b7095fa483616a0a47a">DebugLoc</a> &amp;dl = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getDebugLoc();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2168"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2169"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// How much to shift to the right (meaning: a negative number indicates a left</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2170"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// shift).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2171"><Highlight kind="normal">  int64&#95;t ShiftAmt = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(4).getImm();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2172"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110">ISD::NodeType</a> Opc;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2173"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">switch</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOpcode()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2174"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AVR::Lsl32:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2175"><Highlight kind="normal">    Opc = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a8cc94e03dea594863073a02f5bb94997">ISD::SHL</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2176"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2177"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AVR::Lsr32:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2178"><Highlight kind="normal">    Opc = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a3c6553c8acebe1b57c211ee45e2d8f98">ISD::SRL</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2179"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2180"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AVR::Asr32:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2181"><Highlight kind="normal">    Opc = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a4a055321c361a0f6ee77ed764730ffc1">ISD::SRA</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2182"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2183"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2184"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2185"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Read the input registers, with the most significant register at index 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2186"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::array&lt;std::pair&lt;Register, int&gt;, 4&gt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/sipreallocatewwmregs-cpp/#aac69803381e5a6b3899d87676ada377f">Registers</a> = &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2187"><Highlight kind="normal">      std::pair(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(3).getReg(), AVR::sub&#95;hi),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2188"><Highlight kind="normal">      std::pair(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(3).getReg(), AVR::sub&#95;lo),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2189"><Highlight kind="normal">      std::pair(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(2).getReg(), AVR::sub&#95;hi),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2190"><Highlight kind="normal">      std::pair(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(2).getReg(), AVR::sub&#95;lo),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2191"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2192"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2193"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Do the shift. The registers are modified in-place.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2194"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad64501a368789645f6f80afbce82da90">insertMultibyteShift</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, BB, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/sipreallocatewwmregs-cpp/#aac69803381e5a6b3899d87676ada377f">Registers</a>, Opc, ShiftAmt);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2195"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2196"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Combine the 8-bit registers into 16-bit register pairs.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2197"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This done either from LSB to MSB or from MSB to LSB, depending on the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2198"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// shift. It&#39;s an optimization so that the register allocator will use the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2199"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// fewest movs possible (which order we use isn&#39;t a correctness issue, just an</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2200"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// optimization issue).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2201"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   - lsl prefers starting from the most significant byte (2nd case).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2202"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   - lshr prefers starting from the least significant byte (1st case).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2203"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   - for ashr it depends on the number of shifted bytes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2204"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Some shift operations still don&#39;t get the most optimal mov sequences even</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2205"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// with this distinction. TODO: figure out why and try to fix it (but we&#39;re</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2206"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// already equal to or faster than avr-gcc in all cases except ashr 8).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2207"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Opc != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a8cc94e03dea594863073a02f5bb94997">ISD::SHL</a> &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2208"><Highlight kind="normal">      (Opc != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a4a055321c361a0f6ee77ed764730ffc1">ISD::SRA</a> || (ShiftAmt &lt; 16 || ShiftAmt &gt;= 22))) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2209"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Use the resulting registers starting with the least significant byte.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2210"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a17e04afcf0c5efeb0eb6a9a45287b5e4">BuildMI</a>(&#42;BB, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, dl, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>.get(AVR::REG&#95;SEQUENCE), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(0).getReg())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2211"><Highlight kind="normal">        .<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#a927857fc69e4b4f0cde307f86f180df5">addReg</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/sipreallocatewwmregs-cpp/#aac69803381e5a6b3899d87676ada377f">Registers</a>&#91;3&#93;.first, 0, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/sipreallocatewwmregs-cpp/#aac69803381e5a6b3899d87676ada377f">Registers</a>&#91;3&#93;.second)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2288"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Example instruction sequence, for an atomic 8-bit add:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2289"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   ldi r25, 5</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2290"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   in r0, SREG</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2291"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   cli</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2292"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   ld r24, X</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2293"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   add r25, r24</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2294"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   st X, r25</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2295"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   out SREG, r0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2296"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2297"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TargetRegisterClass &#42;RC =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2298"><Highlight kind="normal">      (Width == 8) ? &amp;AVR::GPR8RegClass : &amp;AVR::DREGSRegClass;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2299"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LoadOpcode = (Width == 8) ? AVR::LDRdPtr : AVR::LDWRdPtr;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2300"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> StoreOpcode = (Width == 8) ? AVR::STPtrRr : AVR::STWPtrRr;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2761"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// so we force it to i16 at least.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2762"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Ty.getSimpleVT() == MVT::i8) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2763"><Highlight kind="normal">        Ty = MVT::i16;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2764"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2765"><Highlight kind="normal">      Result = DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#abf892d1e00a3d79026c5ab518c187c45">getTargetConstant</a>(CUVal64, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, Ty);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2766"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2767"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;N&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">: </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// -1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2768"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CVal64 != -1)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2769"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2770"><Highlight kind="normal">      Result = DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#abf892d1e00a3d79026c5ab518c187c45">getTargetConstant</a>(CVal64, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, Ty);</Highlight></CodeLine>
